definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: When Solomon offered up the temple, the holy fire once again came down from heaven.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門獻殿之時，聖火再次從天而降。

sentences.english: Solomon continued to do this for Hiram year after year.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門每年都是這樣給希蘭。

sentences.english: And king Solomon passed all the kings of the earth in riches and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財富和智慧，勝過世上的列王。

sentences.english: So Huram finished all the work he had undertaken for King Solomon in the temple of the Lord
sentences.chinese: 這樣，他爲所羅門王作完了耶和華殿的一切工。

sentences.english: King Solomon conscripted laborers from all Israel-thirty thousand men.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王從以色列人中挑取服苦的人共有三萬。

sentences.english: And king Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王差遣人往推羅去，將戶蘭召了來。

sentences.english: Also, Jeroboam son of Nebat rebelled against the king.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門的臣僕，尼八的兒子耶羅波安也舉手攻擊王。

sentences.english: Thus King Solomon excelled all the kings of the earth in riches and in wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財寶與智慧勝過天下的列王。

sentences.english: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was 666 talents of gold.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門每年所得的金子共有六百六十六他連得。

sentences.english: The quake struck near the Santa Cruz Islands, which are part of the Solomon Islands nation.
sentences.chinese: 地震發生在所羅門羣島境內的聖克魯斯羣島附近。

sentences.english: How did Solomon's intermarriages influence his devotion to the Lord?
sentences.chinese: 所羅門與外邦女子的婚姻如何影響到他對神的順服？

sentences.english: Then went Solomon to Eziongeber, and to Eloth, at the sea side in the land of Edom.
sentences.chinese: 那時，所羅門往以東地靠海的以旬迦別和以祿去。

sentences.english: So he built the temple and completed it, roofing it with beams and cedar planks.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門建殿，安置香柏木的棟樑，又用香柏木板遮蓋。

sentences.english: He has also held positions at Salomon Brothers Inc. and the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 他也曾在所羅門兄弟公司和世界銀行就職。

sentences.english: And all the earth sought to Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財富和智慧，超過了世界上所有的君王。

sentences.english: He came to King Solomon and did all the work assigned to him.
sentences.chinese: 他來到所羅門王那裏，作王一切所要作的。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
